alert.note: Alert for Phillips (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 6:20PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Phillips and southwestern Harlan Counties through 645 PM CDT... At 620 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Long Island, or 21 miles northwest of Phillipsburg, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Long Island, Prairie View and Woodruff. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for north central Kansas...and south central Nebraska.
